title: Lambda to SQS
description: Create a Lambda function that publishes to an SQS queue

introBox.headline: How it works
text: The SAM template deploys a Lambda function, an SQS queue and the IAM permissions required to run the application. The Lambda function publishes a message to the SQS queue when invoked.
